m_szDocSumamry: Seeking advice/opinions at my financial & life crossroads : personalfinance  012SavingSeeking advice/opinions at my financial & life crossroads (self.personalfinance)submitted 10 months ago by HowToLiveAndSaveI'm 39 years old. I'm at time in my life where I want to live and build wealth, but I feel like i can't really do both. I have the opportunity to do many of the things that I've always wanted to do, but time waits for no man. Life: I raised my daughter as a solo parent (her mom wasn't around). I was 19 when she was born. My life has always been about responsibility, sacrifice, and survivi
